long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool to automatically close tabs when they have been open for a period of time.
Have you ever had a bunch of tabs open from clicking on links that open in a desktop app? Looking at you Zoom and Notion. Now, those tabs would automatically close!
In the options page, you can set how long you would like to wait before closing tabs, and set how many of a type of tab you would like to keep open.
